name: Stranded
description:
Stranded is a 2D game with procedurally (randomly) generated levels. Heavily inspired by exploration, creation and character development games, such as Forager, Don't Starve Together and Stardew Valley.

An action roguelike with a lot of collecting and creation, start with absolutely nothing and using the resources available, build bases, improve your equipment and skills by facing hordes and villages of enemies, go as far as you can, but remember: Once dead, you will have to start everything from ZERO!
